prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent: The Book language is a human-understandable markup language for writing AI applications such as chatbots, knowledge bases, agents, avatars, translators, and automations. It is based on markdown and designed to be easy to read and write.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
